Menu.Name: Ploughman's
Menu.Text: Wiltshire Ham, sliced apples, handmade pickles and chutneys, homemade bread & butter and fresh salad with balsamic drizzle.

Menu.Name: Roast
Menu.Text: Roast beef/chicken/nutroast, roast potatoes, Yorkshire pudding and seasonal veg. Served with gravy. Vegan/Vegetarian options available.

Menu.Name: Stew
Menu.Text: Beef or Root Veg slow cooked stew with homemade suet dumplings. Served with homemade bread. Vegan/Vegetarian options available.

Menu.Name: Fish & Chips
Menu.Text: Beer battered cod and handcut chips fried to order. Served with mushy peas and tartare sauce.
